name: Classic Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
steps:
Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven or soup pot over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion, carrots, and celery. Saut√© for 5-6 minutes until vegetables begin to soften.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add chicken pieces and cook for 4-5 minutes until lightly browned on all sides.
Pour in chicken broth and add bay leaves, thyme, and rosemary.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Remove bay leaves and season with salt and pepper.
Add egg noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes according to package directions until noodles are tender.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
Remove from heat and stir in fresh parsley.
Ladle into bowls and serve hot. Soup can be stored in refrigerator for up to 3 days.
